name: Shinkai: defillama-tvl-rankings
description: Fetches data on DeFi protocols by category (e.g., 'Liquid Staking', 'Lending', 'Bridge', 'Dexes', 'Restaking', 'Liquid Restaking', 'CDP', 'RWA', 'Yield', 'Derivatives', 'Farm', 'Yield Aggregator') and optionally filters by blockchain (e.g., 'Ethereum', 'Solana', 'Arbitrum', 'Base', 'Cardano', 'Near', 'BSC', 'Sui'). Returns protocol details including rank, name, TVL, TVL percentage changes, market cap to TVL ratio, and fees/revenue for the past 24 hours, 7 days, and 30 days.
author: Shinkai

chromePath.description: Optional path to Chrome executable for browser automation

top10.description: If true, returns only the top 10 protocols. If false or null, returns all protocols.

categoryName.description: The DeFi category to filter by (e.g., 'Liquid Staking', 'Lending', 'Bridge', etc.)

networkName.description: Optional blockchain network to filter by (e.g., 'Ethereum', 'Solana', 'Arbitrum', etc.)

tableCsv.description: CSV formatted string containing the protocol rankings and metrics

rowsCount.description: Number of protocols in the result set

columnsCount.description: Number of metrics columns in the result
